entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:34 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:34 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
